tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Father's Day
programme.desc: Mac and Harm are assigned the task of defending a young Marine whose frustration at being unable to wrest custody of his son has led to his being court-martialed for dereliction of duty.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Tiger, Tiger
programme.desc: Harm takes Josh on a weekend cruise for Navy families aboard a frigate. When the frigate is taken over by terrorists who intend to fire missiles at Cuba, Harm and Bud take matters into their own hands to stop the evil plot.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Return of Mimmy Blackhorse
programme.desc: An Army forensic pathologist joins forces with Harm, Mac, Bud and Harriet as they try to verify that newly unearthed human remains are those of a heroic Navajo "code-talker" who had been missing since WWII.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Imposter
programme.desc: Harm is held captive by Palmer, a renegade government agent with whom he had crossed swords a few months ago. While Palmer prepares a life mask so he can pass for Harm, he explains his plans to assassinate the key witness in the trial.(n)

programme.title: JAG: To Russia With Love
programme.desc: With evidence that his missing father could still be alive in, Harm convinces the Admiral to give him time off so he can go to Russia. In Moscow, they are questioned by Mark Falcon, the KGB agent who had stolen a list of POW's earlier from Harm.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Gypsy Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to lose the pursuing Russian fighters, Harm's and Mac’s hijacked Mig is shot out of the sky over Siberia.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Extinction
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must work with their old nemesis Mark Collins in order to prevent the extinction of mankind. Also, Walter and Paige awkwardly navigate their new relationship. Josh Leonard guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: More Extinction
programme.desc: Team Scorpion continues to work with their nemesis, Mark Collins, in order to prevent an extinction event that could end humanity. Also, Cabe's last-minute decision while on the case leads to the possible end of his career.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.sub-title: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.desc: When poachers almost kill a pregnant endangered deer, Team Scorpion recreates the animal's womb to try to save it and its baby's life. Also, Happy and Toby discuss the future of their family.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Nuke Kids on the Block
programme.desc: While decommissioning an old nuclear missile, a simple accident causes Team Scorpion to endure exposure to toxic vapor while trying to prevent the nuke from detonating.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Sci Hard
programme.desc: While attending a tech convention, Team Scorpion is taken hostage by a group attempting a virtual heist.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Queen Scary
programme.desc: At Halloween, Team Scorpion takes on a case to prove the existence of ghosts on the Queen Mary but find an all-too-real disaster when they locate a 'ghost ship' on a deadly collision course.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Extinction
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must work with their old nemesis Mark Collins in order to prevent the extinction of mankind. Also, Walter and Paige awkwardly navigate their new relationship. Josh Leonard guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: "Moving Day"
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, “Moving Day”, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Workhouse
programme.desc: In a place where the homeless were kept and work was hard, death was often the only escape but it seems that wasn’t the way for some as their souls are said to roam this place.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: A haunted house, a haunted school and a haunted auction hall, all in one location, Bishton Hall. With stories of poltergeist activity, ghostly figures, strange voices and a dark entity, what will the Most Haunted team uncover tonight.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: With the night getting ever more active and poltergeist activity growing, something seems to target one of the team. And what activity could make Glen state ‘’that is paranormal’’.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Old House
programme.desc: This week Yvette Fielding takes her Most Haunted team to Coalville and a house that is\nsurrounded by mystery. The team seem to disturb the rest of some of its long-term\nresidence as they battle through a night of terror.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Beaumanor Hall Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large\ncountry house. Without exception every member of the team experience something\nunexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Workhouse

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roller Ghoster
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS heads to Ohio to investigate Kings Island, anamusement park that sits on land that was thesite of an awful accident.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Urgent!
programme.desc: We pick were we last left off, in Hawaii, for the reveal. Jason and Grant were called back for a very important personal case, the Reid House, in Rhode Island, to help a scared 4 year old.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Congress Theater
programme.desc: TAPS heads to Chicago Illinois to investigate a Chicago landmark for nearly a century, the Congress Theater.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Pearl Harbor Phantoms
programme.desc: For the first time ever, TAPS travels to Hawaii to explore one of America's most sacred settings, Pearl Harbor. They are joined in their investigation of the Pacific Aviation Museum by Destination Truth's Josh Gates.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Castalians board the Andromeda to finalize the charter for the New Commonwealth. When the leader is discovered dead, Tyr is the main suspect.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: The Pearls That Were His Eyes
programme.desc: Beka learns that her father's former business partner deals in a highly addictive drug called F lash.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda discovers her sister ship, the Pax Magellanic. The crew aboard Pax is 300 years old, but have not aged a day.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Music of a Distant Drum
programme.desc: Tyr crash lands the Eureka Maru on a Nietzschean planet and develops amnesia. He must remember what he is doing before the Nietzscheans discover him and his crate of stolen goods.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Harper 2.0
programme.desc: Harper receives the gift of knowledge from a dying Perseid, only to discover that the Perseid was being sought by a bounty hunter who has now turned his attention to Harper.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Forced Perspective
programme.desc: Dylan is arrested for assassinating a dictator 300 years ago.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.117
programme.desc: Jealousy leads to assault and theft at golf course/Sued for damaging car, trip costs, and phone.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.156
programme.desc: Woman provides home and job for pregnant student denying misconduct. Woman admits to damaging boyfriend's car but denies debt, citing payment for his prison phone bill.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.98
programme.desc: Woman alleges ex threatened son's jail over Subaru. Intoxicated men, post cage fighting, cause injuries, lawsuits.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.109
programme.desc: While away in rehab, a woman claims her ex-husband neglected to pay rent and utilities and broke her bike/A man sues the mother of his child for overpayment of child support; she says he should consider it the back support that he never paid.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.145
programme.desc: Botched football jerseys are the source of contention between fellow team moms who are suing each other for refunds and damages from alleged harassment.\t\t\t\r\nA HUD house inspection leads to a conflict between a teenage mother and her ex-roommates.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.36
programme.desc: Young man admits making payments on dirt bike he claims was a gift from ex-girlfriend/Man accuses 15-year-old of throwing rock at truck on freeway; teenager blames cousin, countersues for harassment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.13
programme.desc: A woman claims her ex-boyfriend asked her to pawn her jewelry to pay their bills; he says she offered to do it/A loan to pay DUI bills is disputed by ex-lovers, one of whom claims it was a birthday gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.140
programme.desc: Older couple accuses daughter and stepson-in-law of abuse including unpaid loans and theft; young couple denies. Man denies responsibility for drunk driving accident, claims friend knew he was intoxicated.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.21
programme.desc: Partygoer punched, falls into window, needs 30 stitches; assaulter alleges invasion of personal space/Surprise party host sues friends for fighting, property damage/Woman accused of keying car denies jealousy retaliation involving boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.216
programme.desc: A bar patron, who was beaten up and knocked out, blames the bar co-owner for putting him in danger after he was ejected from his establishment.\t\t\t\r\nBrother sues brother over missed payments on a Ford Crown Victoria.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.174
programme.desc: A hit-and-run, drug charges, and an alleged bailout leave a teenager suing her ex-roommate’s boyfriend for a loan. He claims he never asked for her help.\t\t\t\r\nA woman claims her former friend racked up charges on a rental car that was in her name.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.117
programme.desc: Jealousy leads to assault and theft at golf course/Sued for damaging car, trip costs, and phone.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After Giovanni goes home, Michelle and Elise continue their heated fight. The chefs compete in a game meat challenge. Michelle sends up raw chicken, Barbie sends up raw duck and Manda sends up raw pork. The teams must decide who to nominate.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Elise and Michelle get into a heated argument that carries over into the next day. In the challenge, the chefs toss fish to collect ingredients. While Barbie annoys her team in punishment, the blue team heads to Vegas for a night of revelry.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Nine all-star chefs compete in a blind taste test challenge, in which they must identify herbs and spices with smashing consequences for their teammates. While one chef guesses, one chef sits in the hot seat and is hit with a mashed potato cannon.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With eight chefs remaining, the red and blue teams battle in a pasta-profit challenge and later go toe-to-toe in a dinner service that features a tense race to the finish.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After Dana goes home, the seven remaining chefs learn that it is black jacket day. Chef Ramsay explains that the chefs will compete in three challenges in order to earn their black jacket.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After Giovanni goes home, Michelle and Elise continue their heated fight. The chefs compete in a game meat challenge. Michelle sends up raw chicken, Barbie sends up raw duck and Manda sends up raw pork. The teams must decide who to nominate.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hayseed Inferno
programme.desc: Sonia pushes the company to repossess more than just cars, and the backlash from the team threatens to end her time in charge before it's even begun. Ronnie and Matt attempt to repo from a reckless motocross daredevil.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bullseye!
programme.desc: Sonia, the new boss, is still struggling to keep the team in line, but when tragedy strikes on a routine repossession, her reign at the top faces its biggest challenge yet. Matt and Froy hit the club to take a sports car away from a deadbeat DJ.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Phi Alpha Fail
programme.desc: Carlos goes undercover at a frat house, but when the party gets the best of him Sonia has to step in and fight the drunken mob. Matt and Ronnie go after some wanna-be internet sensations.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Boys with Toys
programme.desc: Matt is eager to work his way onto Sonia's coveted airplane repo, despite her adamancy against him.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Mile High Mayhem
programme.desc: On this special season finale of Operation Repo, the team gears up for a mile-high repo of a lifetime! Froy and Sonia repo a water blob from a lake house, but the RO and his friends refuse to let this deflate their party.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Reclaim the Plane
programme.desc: In the premiere of the final season of Operation Repo, the team must recover an airplane and return one hundred thousand dollars. But two members of the team bail when it's time to save the company.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: First Rule of Repo
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. With Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Natural Liar
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. But with Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Froylan Job
programme.desc: A hoarder with a secret tries to pull a fast one on Matt and Froy, and Sonia takes sides in a dramatic lover's quarrel. Froy finally gets a shot at recovering the Lamborghini, but will his ingenious plan come crashing down around him?(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: Sonia pushes the company to repossess more than just cars, and the backlash from the team threatens to end her time in charge before it's even begun. Ronnie and Matt attempt to repo from a reckless motocross daredevil.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bullseye!
programme.desc: Sonia, the new boss, is still struggling to keep the team in line, but when tragedy strikes on a routine repossession, her reign at the top faces its biggest challenge yet. Matt and Froy hit the club to take a sports car away from a deadbeat DJ.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Phi Alpha Fail
programme.desc: Carlos goes undercover at a frat house, but when the party gets the best of him Sonia has to step in and fight the drunken mob. Matt and Ronnie go after some wanna-be internet sensations.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Boys with Toys
programme.desc: Matt is eager to work his way onto Sonia's coveted airplane repo, despite her adamancy against him.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Mile High Mayhem
programme.desc: On this special season finale of Operation Repo, the team gears up for a mile-high repo of a lifetime! Froy and Sonia repo a water blob from a lake house, but the RO and his friends refuse to let this deflate their party.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Reclaim the Plane
programme.desc: In the premiere of the final season of Operation Repo, the team must recover an airplane and return one hundred thousand dollars. But two members of the team bail when it's time to save the company.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: First Rule of Repo
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. With Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Natural Liar
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. But with Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Froylan Job
programme.desc: A hoarder with a secret tries to pull a fast one on Matt and Froy, and Sonia takes sides in a dramatic lover's quarrel. Froy finally gets a shot at recovering the Lamborghini, but will his ingenious plan come crashing down around him?(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Refusing To Budget
programme.desc: Timmy convinces Russell he needs a budget when the utilities are turned off in his apartment. Meanwhile, Audrey has a mentee who wants to see her office and learn about publishing.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Little Bummer Boy
programme.desc: When Russell decides to borrow a holiday concept of gift-giving from Adam, both Adam and his co-workers are in for surprises. Meanwhile, Audrey wants to make people laugh at Jeff's holiday party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Home Stretch
programme.desc: When Jeff discovers that a guy is giving Audrey home Pilates classes, he wants to make a change. Meanwhile, Adam tells Jennifer specifics about his football past.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Uh-Oh It's Magic
programme.desc: When Russell takes his date to a magic show, the magician makes her disappear. Meanwhile, Audrey unknowingly slips up when she tells Brenda's girlfriend about the baby.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Singing and Dancing
programme.desc: When Timmy joins an a cappella group, he wants to keep it a secret from Russell. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey discover they have a new annoying neighbor.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Anniversary Chicken
programme.desc: When Jeff decides to surprise Audrey by remembering their anniversary, he's the one who ends up being surprised. Meanwhile, Timmy is forced to be Russell's interpreter on a date.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Day
programme.desc: When Jeff proclaims it's 'Jeff Day', he gets his way until the cleaning lady arrives. Meanwhile, Adam has to figure out why his eye is twitching.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Zygote
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey see a fertility specialist with their surrogate, they discover a zygote. Meanwhile, Russell and Timmy go on double dates again.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Set Up
programme.desc: When Russell discovers Timmy has a sister, he aims to impress her. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey set their neighbor Liz up on a date.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Beating the System
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey learn their surrogate is pregnant, both of their lives change. Meanwhile, Timmy takes on the responsibility of wedding planner for Adam and Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Great Debate
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Facebooked
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But unfortunately they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mano-a-Mano
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.sub-title: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Great Debate
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.(n)

programme.title: Rise Of The Fellowship
programme.desc: What if The Lord of the Rings wasn’t just a story? What if it happened to you? Randall Dooley and his friends are outcasts at school, spending most of their time playing online games. After Randall is set up for a crime he didn’t commit.(n)

programme.title: Cyber Bride
programme.desc: After his wife tragically dies, a desperate widowed husband finds a service online that can bring her back - But not all is as it seems.(n)

programme.title: Terra Formars
programme.desc: In an attempt to colonise Mars, 21st-century scientists seed the planet with algae to absorb sunlight and purify the atmosphere...(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Robin Williams, Al Pacino and Hilary Swank star in a thriller set in the land of the midnight sun, where the mind of even a tough cop can be threatened by Insomnia.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: Beneath the icy surface, survivors of Colony Seven struggle as food supplies dwindle and temperatures drop. Plagued by illness, the colonists suspect the worst when they mysteriously lose contact with Colony Five, the only other known settlement.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.sub-title: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.desc: Jack Hunter is abducted blindfolded to a Turkish US base to be recruited by the NSA, told his mentor was killed because Albert Littmann's Russian mob employer Doridanov want the ancient Osiris-weapon.(n)

programme.title: Dead Zone
programme.desc: An elite team of soldiers who, to stop the collapse of humanity, descend on a radiation-poisoned town and perform the ultimate stealth mission using high-tech armor and weapons.(n)

programme.title: Ninja: Shadow of a Tear
programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Casey is back and out for revenge when his pregnant wife is murdered.(n)

programme.title: Assassination
programme.desc: When an ex-CIA agent discovers his family have been kidnapped, he sets out to rescue them, only to find they are being held hostage and won't be released unless he carries out a mission to assassinate the President.(n)

programme.title: K9 Christmas: Scoot & Kassie's Christmas Adventure
programme.desc: Kassie rescues Scoot, a former K-9 police dog, who becomes her best friend. But when two men turn up to work at the bank that Kassie's dad (Luke Perry) manages she finds out they are crooks with plans to get their hands on all the money and ruin Christmas.(n)

programme.title: I'll Be Next Door For Christmas
programme.desc: When 16-year-old Nicky’s long-distance boyfriend decides to visit for the holidays, she’s determined to spare him her family’s over-the-top Christmas obsession, by staging a fake Christmas dinner in the empty house next door...(n)

programme.title: Wish Upon A Christmas
programme.desc: When business executive Amelia returns home to help a family-run ornament company, the employees see her as their savior who is coming in to rescue the company.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Sitters
programme.desc: Facing holiday flight delays, two parents double-book incompatible babysitters: the mother's lawyer friend, Nora, and the dad's half-brother, Max, to look after their kids. An attraction grows and it seems a Christmas miracle might be on the cards.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: All Around The Town
programme.desc: An innocent girl is kidnapped and held hostage for two years causing her to develop multiple personalities and making her the number one suspect when her English professor is brutally murdered.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.desc: Having the winning lottery jackpot ticket is the best thing that could have happened to delivery man Bill Regan. Determined to find out what happened, a friend retraces Bill's delivery stops and discovers they lead to her own husband.(n)

programme.title: My Family's Secret
programme.desc: Starring Nicholle Tom and Dylan Neal. When Lara starts to investigate the attempted suicide of her husband and sister-in-law, she is led to his mentally ill brother, Grady - and finds herself in grave danger.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Beauty
programme.desc: A pretty, successful masseuse and spa owner pays the price for being a good Samaritan when the young woman she helps turns out to be a ruthless killer.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Roscoe Turns Detective
programme.desc: Army mule and horse remounts are stolen from a Tombstone stable. The owner was severely injured and didn't see the robbers but Roscoe did and was kicked by a stolen mule.(n)

programme.title: Gone With The West
programme.desc: After being framed, a cowboy is sent to jail. After his time is served, he leaves with vengeance in his heart. Soon he meets a young Native American woman and together they go to settle their score with a small town and its corrupt leader.(n)

programme.title: Ballad of Death Valley: Ballad of Death Valley
programme.desc: An 'angel-faced' gunfighter is tasked with infiltrating a ranch overrun by Mexican bandits and saving their hostages, including the fiancée of the local sheriff.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Shadows
programme.desc: When Johnny foresees the death of someone very close to him, he must confront his inner demons before they push him to the brink of murder.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Tipping Point
programme.desc: As problems with his dead zone become life threatening, Johnny must decide whether to have brain surgery, knowing he might lose his psychic abilities that may help prevent Armageddon.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Broken Circle
programme.desc: Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) fights to stop Rebecca (Sarah Wynter) from killing Greg Stillson (Sean Patrick Flanery), whom she believes is responsible for her sister's murder.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Half dense Players (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante is assigned to take custody of an unusual murder suspect, a beautiful artist plagued by strange visions that may threaten reality itself.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Cycle of Violence
programme.desc: When Johnny has a vision of a school shooting, the principal focuses on a particularly outspoken student focuses on a particularly outspoken student as the likeliest culprit while Johnny struggles to discover the identity of the shooter.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Instinct
programme.desc: Johnny and Walt (Chris Bruno) investigate the sudden violent behavior of the animals around Cleaves Mills while Reverend Purdy (David Ogden Stiers) wrestles with his faith and past decisions.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Shadows
programme.desc: When Johnny foresees the death of someone very close to him, he must confront his inner demons before they push him to the brink of murder.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Tipping Point
programme.desc: As problems with his dead zone become life threatening, Johnny must decide whether to have brain surgery, knowing he might lose his psychic abilities that may help prevent Armageddon.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Broken Circle
programme.desc: Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) fights to stop Rebecca (Sarah Wynter) from killing Greg Stillson (Sean Patrick Flanery), whom she believes is responsible for her sister's murder.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Bliss
programme.desc: Lili is given a psychotropic drug called "bliss" via a Taelon device. They discover it is widespread. With an instantly strong addictive property, the addicts are dying within 48 hours. The investigation leads Liam and Sandoval to Ireland.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Chimera
programme.desc: There is a sentient organic nanite causing havoc in the computer system in the Sanctuary. Magnus and Tesla connect their minds to the system in an effort to isolate the nanite. They find Adam Worth instead.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Acolyte
programme.desc: A radical group of abnormal beings plan a terrorist attack with the goal of starting a war between surface dwellers and hollow Earth inhabitants. To Magnus' disbelief, Addison, at the NSA, has proof of Biggie's leadership of the group.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Depths
programme.desc: When Magnus and Will learn of a plan to capture very rare and dangerous Abnormal, they travel to a remote cave to prevent then hunt.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary for None Pt 1
programme.desc: When the Sanctuary is approached by an abnormal leader about a radical plan for peace, Magnus goes all in and pledges her full support. However, when Will is forced to leave the Sanctuary, his decision may just put everyone at risk.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Bliss
programme.desc: Lili is given a psychotropic drug called "bliss" via a Taelon device. They discover it is widespread. With an instantly strong addictive property, the addicts are dying within 48 hours. The investigation leads Liam and Sandoval to Ireland.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Chimera
programme.desc: There is a sentient organic nanite causing havoc in the computer system in the Sanctuary. Magnus and Tesla connect their minds to the system in an effort to isolate the nanite. They find Adam Worth instead.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Acolyte
programme.desc: A radical group of abnormal beings plan a terrorist attack with the goal of starting a war between surface dwellers and hollow Earth inhabitants. To Magnus' disbelief, Addison, at the NSA, has proof of Biggie's leadership of the group.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Depths
programme.desc: When Magnus and Will learn of a plan to capture very rare and dangerous Abnormal, they travel to a remote cave to prevent then hunt.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary for None Pt 1
programme.desc: When the Sanctuary is approached by an abnormal leader about a radical plan for peace, Magnus goes all in and pledges her full support. However, when Will is forced to leave the Sanctuary, his decision may just put everyone at risk.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)
